00020 
00021 __device void svm_node_combine_rgb(ShaderData *sd, float *stack, uint in_offset, uint color_index, uint out_offset)
00022 {
00023     float color = stack_load_float(stack, in_offset);
00024 
00025     if (stack_valid(out_offset))
00026         stack_store_float(stack, out_offset+color_index, color);
00027 }
00028 
00029 __device void svm_node_separate_rgb(ShaderData *sd, float *stack, uint icolor_offset, uint color_index, uint out_offset)
00030 {
00031     float3 color = stack_load_float3(stack, icolor_offset);
00032 
00033     if (stack_valid(out_offset)) {
00034         if (color_index == 0)
00035             stack_store_float(stack, out_offset, color.x);
00036         else if (color_index == 1)
00037             stack_store_float(stack, out_offset, color.y);
00038         else
00039             stack_store_float(stack, out_offset, color.z);
00040     }
00041 }
00042
